typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		canal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> diffus
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		Canal as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> chantier
rename, Arrange union(byName: true)~> Union1
chantier select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		{Créateur offre},
		Canal,
		UserLowerCase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Arrange
diffus select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		CodeATC,
		Canal = canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix client} as string,
		{Prix négoce} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Typologie projet} as string,
		DateValidite as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['stg_offre'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10000,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PLATEFORMES
source(output(
		{Année} as string,
		Documentation as string,
		Marque as string,
		Cible as string,
		{Périmètre} as string,
		Levier as string,
		Canal as string,
		{Hiérarchie inclues} as string,
		{Hiérarchies exclues} as string,
		Type as string,
		{Valeur Annuelle} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> levierPerformance
dataCommerciale filter(instr(lower({origine de la ligne}), "ecoulement") > 0 || lower({origine de la ligne}) == "facturation avec matching") ~> Filter1
Select4 derive(HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansingInput
PLATEFORMES derive(HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansingPlateformes
cleansingInput, cleansingPlateformes join(cleansingInput@HubSAPid == cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateformes
innerPlateformes derive({Type de vente} = WholeSalerID) ~> innerTypeDeVente
cleansingInput, cleansingPlateformes join(cleansingInput@HubSAPid == cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftPlateforme
fullLeftPlateforme filter(isNull(cleansingPlateformes@HubSAPid)) ~> outerLeftPlateforme
outerLeftPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = cleansingInput@HubSAPid,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque = marque_name,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation = N5LocalDesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive({Type de vente} = "Ventes directes") ~> leftTypeDeVente
Select2, leftTypeDeVente union(byName: true)~> Union1
innerTypeDeVente select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = cleansingInput@HubSAPid,
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		marque,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_name,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation = N5LocalDesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		{Type de vente}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		distributeur,
		data_origin,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		canal_jointure = canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_name,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe,
		Hierarchielocale,
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		ATC,
		ATC1,
		ATC2,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		designation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande},
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		{Type de vente},
		OrgCm = marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
Rename derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		id_canal_final = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		canal = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		id_canal = toInteger(canal_jointure),
		{Canal Final} = toInteger(canal_jointure)) ~> typeParse
typeParse filter(!isNull(ATC) && !isNull(distributeur)) ~> ATCandDistributeurNotNull
Filter3 derive({diffus/chantier} = trim(split(Cible, " ")[2], " "),
		ID_KPI = "Sum_XRow_"+toString(RecordID)) ~> newColumn
uniqueLevier keyGenerate(output(RecordID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> RecordID
newColumn select(mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie = {Hiérarchie inclues},
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
levierPerformance filter({Année}=="2020") ~> YEARFILTER
Select3 derive(Marque = split(Marque, "."),
		Canal = split(Canal, ","),
		Hierarchie = split(Hierarchie, ",")) ~> splitting
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Hierarchie),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenHierarchie
splitting foldDown(unroll(Marque),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenMarque
FlattenMarque foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libellé levié},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
FlattenHierarchie filter(length(Hierarchie)==3) ~> lenHierarchie3
ATCandDistributeurNotNull, lenHierarchie3 join(OrgCm == Marque
	&& lower(canal_final) == {diffus/chantier}
	&& canal_jointure == FlattenHierarchie@Canal
	&& N2locale == Hierarchie
	&& year == {Année},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerLevier
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {plateforme/vente directe},
		data_origin = {origine de la ligne},
		reference = {code produit},
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = {code client plateforme livree},
		canal_distribution_final,
		year,
		month,
		qt_final = quantite,
		ca_final = ca,
		canal_final,
		POSSAMidString = {Code client livré},
		marque_name = marque,
		no_offre,
		Hierarchiegroupe = {Hiérarchgroupe},
		Hierarchielocale = {Hiérarchlocale},
		N2groupe,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N1GroupeDesignation = N1groupedesignation,
		N2GroupeDesignation = N2groupedesignation,
		N3GroupeDesignation = N3groupedesignation,
		N4GroupeDesignation = N4groupedesignation,
		N5GroupeDesignation = N5groupedesignation,
		N6GroupeDesignation = N6groupedesignation,
		N7GroupeDesignation = N7groupedesignation,
		N1LocalDesignation = N1localedesignation,
		N2LocalDesignation = N2localedesignation,
		N3LocalDesignation = N3localedesignation,
		N4LocalDesignation = N4localedesignation,
		N6LocalDesignation = N6localedesignation,
		N7LocalDesignation = N7localedesignation,
		{Code postal},
		marque = marque_code,
		ATC = {ATC Performance},
		ATC1 = {ATC livré},
		ATC2 = {ATC offre},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Numéro du compte},
		{Nom du compte},
		N1groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		document_vente,
		N5LocalDesignation = N5localedesignation,
		{Type de facture},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Motif commande}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
innerLevier filter(Type=="CA") ~> levierCA
levierCA pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(ca_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
innerLevier filter(Type=="Quantité") ~> levierQA
levierQA pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(qt_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot2
Pivot1, Pivot2 union(byName: true)~> Union2
FlattenHierarchie filter(length(Hierarchie)!=3) ~> lenHierarchieNot3
ATCandDistributeurNotNull, lenHierarchieNot3 join(OrgCm == Marque
	&& canal_jointure == FlattenHierarchie@Canal
	&& lower(canal_final) == {diffus/chantier}
	&& N1locale == Hierarchie
	&& year == {Année},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerLevier2
innerLevier2 filter(Type=="Quantité") ~> levierQA2
levierQA2 pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(qt_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot3
innerLevier2 filter(Type=="CA") ~> levierCA2
levierCA2 pivot(groupBy(year,
		month,
		ATC,
		{Type de vente},
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(ca_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot4
Pivot3, Pivot4 union(byName: true)~> Union3
Union2, Union3 union(byName: true)~> Union4
RecordID filter(!isNull(Documentation) || !isNull(Levier)) ~> Filter3
YEARFILTER derive({Libellé levié} = Levier+"-"+Documentation+" "+Cible+" "+{Périmètre}+" "+iif({Valeur Annuelle}=="YES", "Annuel", "Mensuel")) ~> libelleLevier
libelleLevier aggregate(groupBy({Année},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		{Hiérarchie inclues},
		{Hiérarchies exclues},
		Type,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	{Libellé levié} = max({Libellé levié})) ~> uniqueLevier
uniqueLevier aggregate(groupBy({Libellé levié}),
	count = count({Libellé levié})) ~> Aggregate1
Union4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_LEVIERS_RH'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
Select3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,

	),

Filter2 derive(month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2),

ExtractYearAndMonth filter(not({Qté Mois A}=='0')) ~> FiltreQteMois

ExtractYearAndMonth filter({Qté Mois A}=='0') ~> FiltreQteMoisANull
FiltreQteMois filter({Ref fournisseur}!='') ~> FiltreRefFournisseur
FiltreRefFournisseur derive({Agence du client} = replace(replace({Agence du client}, " ", ""), "ETS", ""),
		{Qté Mois A} = toDouble({Qté Mois A})) ~> caEcoulementAndAgenceClient
caEcoulementAndAgenceClient filter({Agence du client} != '') ~> FiltreAgenceClient
OrganisationMabilleSonac derive(POSid = replace( replace({POSid}, " ", ""),'ETS','' )) ~> POSid
POSid filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> FiltrePOSid
FiltrePOSid aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),

	joinType:'inner',

FiltreAgenceClient, uniqueOrganisation join({Agence du client} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',

quantityNotNull derive({Quantité} = toDouble({Quantité})) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dépot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dépot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qté facturée} = toDouble({Qté facturée}),
		yearmonth = trim(yearmonth, " "),
		Article = trim(Article, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> sumQuantity

	&& {Référence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
Rename derive(yearmonth = toString(yearmonth),
		Article = toString(Article),
		{Code client} = toString({Code client})) ~> typeCaste
DerivedColumn1, typeCaste join(DerivedColumn1@Yearmonth == typeCaste@yearmonth
	&& {Référence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive({Quantité} = {Quantité}-{Qté ventes directes}) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
sumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1

		{Société} = upper({Société})) ~> marqueFile

		marque_file

getYearmonth derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="février","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="août", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="décembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber

monthToNumber filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull

	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation

	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation

	&& REFFOURNISSEUR == Article

	joinType:'inner',

source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as integer,
		{Canal distribution} as integer,
		{Secteur d'activité} as integer,
		{Document de vente} as integer,
		Poste as integer,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as integer,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as integer,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as double,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as integer,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as float,
		{CA cdé} as float,
		{Qté livrée} as float,
		{CA livré} as float,
		{Qté facturée} as float,
		{CA facturé} as float,
		{Cout standard cdé} as float,
		{Cout fabrication} as float,
		{Cout standard livré} as float,
		{Cout standard facturé} as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter = iif( ( instr({Type de facture},"YFAR")==0 && instr({Motif commande},"FAS")==0 ) || ( instr({Type de facture},"YFAB")==0 && instr({Motif commande},"FAS")==0 ), 1, 0)) ~> factureFilter
factureFilter, plateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
Select3 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> newID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
newID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
changementDePeriodeFiltre derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
facturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
factureFilter, plateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	{Qté facturée} = mean({Qté facturée})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 derive(join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(DerivedColumn1@join == DerivedColumn2@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire = {Qté facturée},
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select6 derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
Select7, addperiod union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentielPrix'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput
